description_txt: stated on January 19, 2014 in an email:

footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • February 9, 2014

description_txt: stated on February 4, 2014 in a news release.:
quote_txt: "The CBO’s latest report confirms what Republicans have been saying for years now. Under Obamacare, millions of hardworking Americans will lose their jobs."

quote_txt: "If you have a union job, you're making on average $950 a week. If you have a non-union job, you're making $750 a week."

description_txt: stated on January 28, 2014 in a press conference:

quote_txt: On abortion

quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama has issued upwards of 1,000 executive orders, more than any modern president.

description_txt: stated on February 3, 2014 in a broadcast of MSNBC's "Politics Nation":
quote_txt: Says Bill O’Reilly spoke 40 percent of the words in an interview with President Barack Obama.
